title: CUDA initialization fails fatally in multiprocessing
body_html:
Reported by @yuandong-tian

Minimum reproducible example:

import torch
import torch.cuda
import multiprocessing as mp
import torch.nn as nn

print("Cuda: " + str(torch.cuda.is_available()))

class RLSolver(mp.Process):
    def __init__(self, model):
        super(RLSolver, self).__init__()
        self.model = model

    def run(self):
        # Local reference.
        model = self.model
        model.cuda()

class Model(nn.Container):
    def __init__(self):
        super(Model, self).__init__()
        self.linear = nn.Linear(20, 30)

model = Model()
solver = RLSolver(model)
solver.start()

Output:

Cuda: True
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/home/soumith/local/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c line=66 error=3 : initialization error
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'THException'
  what():  cuda runtime error (3) : initialization error at /home/soumith/local/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c:66

solver = RLSolver(model)
